Possibility of a Hidden Camera in bedroom is almost 15%. 

Scan for devices listed below: 

1. Smoke Detector - 
Precaution: Apply sticker/tape over the viewable part of the detector. 

2. Air Conditioner - 
Precaution: Use fan and turn off the AC if possible. Turn rotating blades off. 

3. Television - 
Precaution: Turn off main supply, keep objects in front of lens looking part of the TV. 

4. Night Lamp - 
Precaution: Keep it off or change it's position. 

 5.Flower Pot - 
Precaution: Change position to least viewable area. 

6. Coffee Maker - 
Precaution: Unplug it and put it inside cupboard. 

 Finally Do NOT forget to turn off the lights.
